data.title: Bucknell University
data.meta_description: Lindsey Ferro (10) Attack - In 2013:  Suffered a season-ending knee injury in fall ball.  In 2012: Played through some injuries and saw action in 1...
data.text:
In 2012: Played through some injuries and saw action in 15 games, including nine starts at attack ... named to Patriot League All-Academic Team at season's end ... one of the team's primary feeders ... scored five goals and led the squad with 21 assists ... ranked third in the Patriot League in assists per game ... 21 assists rank seventh on Bucknell's all-time single-season list ... recorded six multi-assist games, with a high of four against Presbyterian ... also had a goal in that game for a career-high five points ... handed out three assists in a game three times, against George Washington, Saint Francis (Pa.) and Howard ... had back-to-back two-goal games against Lafayette and Holy Cross.

In 2011: Played in 15 games as a freshman ... scored seven goals and had four assists in an 11-point season ... scored a hat-trick against Howard ... also scored against Penn State, Saint Francis (Pa.), American and Manhattan ... registered six ground balls, 12 draw controls and two caused turnovers.
